page.title: 20SUMMARY
page.content:
ROUND OFF
North of Histon is were we have been studying.We have been talking to many different people about the way they live in the 1980's.We talked to Mrs. Chapman and Mr.& Mrs.Wyatt about farming.There isn't many shops in the area but we talked to two people who own a shop.Their names were Mrs.Pullan and Mrs.Pearson.Dr.Ravensdale talked about the history of Landbeach.Rev. Mac.Donald-Milne and Mrs.White told us about village life.Also on the disc there are a few pages about what the area consists of and some games the children play.On another page there are all the British foods that we eat.On a couple of pages there is a description of a families day.
